title: FS-T206s Graded & Raw  Scans included - ALL SOLD

posts.post_title: FS-T206s Graded & Raw  Scans included - ALL SOLD
posts.post_content:
Hello All

I've got a few T206s that I'm looking to sell. I can accept Paypal, check or money order as payment. Prices include shipping and handling. If interested, please contact me through this thread or PM. No emails please. If better scans are needed, feel free to ask. 

Thanks for looking

Jantz

Ewing PD 150-25 Multiple wrinkles (top right corner, front of card), speck of paperloss (top of card front)   $25-----SOLD

Devore SC 350-460-42 Multiple creases on card, this card also displays a nice wet sheet transfer-----SOLD

Ganzel PD 350-25 No wrinkles/creases, brown substance on top of card back   $25-----SOLD
Unglaub PD 350-25 Crease on lower left corner   $25-----SOLD
Berger SGC 30 SC 350-460-42 OP Crease across width of card   $25-----SOLD

Sharpe SGC 40 SC 350-30 No wrinkles/creases or paperloss. Sharp card! ;) -----SOLD

I'll take the Devore.  I can do PayPal, check or MO.  Send address or PayPal address.

Thanks.

Hi Ray

I've sent a PM to you with my Paypal address.

Thanks Again

Jantz

2012 New Year bump

Two cards remaining


Jantz

I'll take the Ganzel.  I'll send a check.  Please send me your address.  thanks
Merrill
